about_the_game:
Baradroid Guide is a spoiler document with all the choices you need to make to unlock all CGs and all the endings. It's the easiest way to unlock the whole game's content.

This DLC contains a PDF FULL OF SPOILERS about Baradroid - A Gay Visual Novel.

To access the document, you need to go to:

Location:
C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\common\Baradroid - A Gay Visual Novel\Baradroid - Guide.pdf

content_descriptors.notes: Baradroid - Guide contains spoilers of Baradroid: A Gay Visual Novel and reveals how to unlock its content. While you use it in the game, you'll watch NSFW scenes. This document, however, doesn't have any graphic NSFW scenes or strong language.

detailed_description:
Baradroid Guide is a spoiler document with all the choices you need to make to unlock all CGs and all the endings. It's the easiest way to unlock the whole game's content.

This DLC contains a PDF FULL OF SPOILERS about Baradroid - A Gay Visual Novel.

To access the document, you need to go to:

Location:
C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\common\Baradroid - A Gay Visual Novel\Baradroid - Guide.pdf
name: Baradroid - Guide

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows® 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or Better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 Capable GPU
  • Storage: 1 MB available space

short_description: A spoiler document with all the choices you need to make to unlock all CGs and all the endings. It's the easiest way to unlock the whole game's content (including Steam Achievements).
